articles.description: A plastic bag ban goes into effect on January 1, 2021 in Delaware. Philadelphia and New Jersey residents have one in their future.
articles.content:
WILMINGTON, Delaware (WPVI) -- Starting Friday, shoppers in Delaware may need to bring their own bag.The state's new plastic bag ban law goes into effect on January 1.
This means stores will no long… [+3994 chars]

articles.author: Shannen Sharpe
articles.title: Long lines for vaccinations at Tennessee Riverpark following eligibility expansions - WTVC
articles.description: As 2020 wraps up, dozens upon dozens of cars lined up in Hamilton County to get the COVID-19 vaccine at the Tennessee Riverpark. Watch the Facebook Livestream of the backup on Amnicola Highway at Highway 153. Lines went past Chattanooga State along Amnicola H…
